bioconda.name: bioconductor-chromplot
bioconda.summary: Global visualization tool of genomic data

biotools.summary: Package designed to visualize genomic data along the chromosomes, where the vertical chromosomes are sorted by number, with sex chromosomes at the end.

bioschemas.name: chromPlot
bioschemas.summary: Package designed to visualize genomic data along the chromosomes, where the vertical chromosomes are sorted by number, with sex chromosomes at the end.
